Forward¶

class forward.ForwardOperator(data, sig_d, setting, transform=None, measurement=None, nparams=None)¶

Base Forward operator. Combines a transform and a measurement operator Children of this class must define analysis/synthesis forward and gradg functions Children must also take data and sig_d in the constructor Number of model parameters must also be given

class forward.PathIntegralOperator(pathmatrix, data, sig_d, setting, L, B, J_min, dirs=1, spin=0)¶
class forward.WaveletTransformOperator(data, sig_d, setting, L, B, J_min, dirs=1, spin=0)¶
